titleStmt.title: A briefe description of Ireland: made in this yeare, 1589. by Robert Payne, vnto xxv. of his partners for whome he is vndertaker there. Truely published verbatim, according to his letters, by Nich. Gorsan one of the sayd partners, for that he would his countreymen should be partakers of the many good notes therein contayned
titleStmt.author: Payne, Robert, fl. 1589.
Gorsan, Nicholas.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
